Strawberry Rhubarb Crisp (Dough)
- Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
- In a medium-sized bowl, combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, ½ cup granulated sugar, ¼ teaspoon salt, ⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg, and 1 tablespoon of finely grated fresh ginger.
- Cut in ¾ cup cold vegan butter (or coconut oil), using a pastry cutter or fork, until the mixture resembles coarse sand.
- Add 1 cup rolled oats and toss to coat.
- Set aside.

- Wash and slice 4 cups of rhubarb stalks into thin strips.
- Slice 4 cups of strawberries into small pieces.
- Combine sliced

Rewritten Instructions:
Strawberry Rhubarb Crisp (Dough)
- Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
- In a medium-sized bowl, combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, ½ cup granulated sugar, ¼ teaspoon salt, ⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg, and 1 tablespoon of finely grated fresh ginger.
- Cut in ¾ cup cold vegan butter (or coconut oil), using a pastry cutter or fork, until the mixture resembles coarse sand.
- Add 1 cup rolled oats and toss to coat.
- Set aside.
Filling:
- Wash and slice 4 cups of rhubarb stalks into thin strips.
- Slice 4 cups of strawberries into small pieces.
- Combine sliced

Recipe name: Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: chicken breasts, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, bread crumbs, olive oil, salt, black pepper, grated parmesan.
Preparation method: 
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut chicken into thin slices.
3. Season both sides of chicken with salt and black pepper.
4. Dip chicken in beaten egg then coat with bread crumbs mixed with grated parmesan.
5. Place coated chicken onto baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Pour marinara

Ingredients: chicken breasts, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, egg, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper.
Preparation Method: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 C). Pound chicken breasts thin. Mix together bread crumbs, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. Dip chicken pieces first in beaten egg, then coat well with crumb mixture. Arrange coated chicken pieces in baking pan. Pour marinara sauce over top. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella and parmesan cheeses evenly across chicken. Bake uncovered for approximately 25 – 30 min., or until chicken reaches internal temperature of 165F (74C).

Preparation Method: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 C). Pound chicken breasts thin. Mix together bread crumbs, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. Dip chicken pieces first in beaten egg, then coat well with crumb mixture. Arrange coated chicken pieces in baking pan. Pour marinara sauce over top. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella and parmesan cheeses evenly across chicken. Bake uncovered for approximately 25 – 30 min., or until chicken reaches internal temperature of 165F (74C).
Cooking Tips: Let cooked chicken rest for several minutes prior to serving so juices redistribute within meat.
Serving Suggestions: Serve hot with pasta or

Recipe name: Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: chicken breasts, bread crumbs, egg, flour, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, grated parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, vegetable oil
Directions: 
Preheat oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Cut chicken into small pieces. Dip cut up chicken first in flour then beaten egg and finally coat with breadcrumbs. Place coated chicken onto baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden brown. Remove from oven and top with marinara sauce and shredded cheeses. Return to oven and bake again until heated through and cheese has melted. Let sit before serving.  

Note: You can add extra flavor by adding Italian seasoning to both the breadcrumb mixture and the marinara sauce. Also, you may want to marinate your chicken overnight in an egg wash mixed with Italian seasonings.

Recipe name: Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: chicken breasts, bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, egg whites, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, basil, salt, pepper.
Preparation method: 
1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 C).
2. Cut chicken breasts horizontally so they become thinner.
3. Place a slice of mozzarella inside each cut piece of chicken breast.
4. In three separate shallow dishes mix breadcrumbs, grated parmesan cheese, beaten egg white, dried herbs, salt, and black pepper.
5. Dip each chicken breast first in the egg white then coat thoroughly in the breadcrumb mixture.
6. Heat olive oil over medium heat in large skillet.
7. Sear chicken breasts for approximately 2 minutes per side.
8. Transfer seared chicken breasts onto baking sheet lined with parchment

Recipe name: Banana Graham Cracker Pudding
Ingredients: Sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, egg yolk, butter, vanilla extract, mashed bananas, crushed graham crackers.
Instructions:
In a medium saucepan combine sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, and egg yolk. Cook stirring until thickened and bubbly. Remove from heat add butter and vanilla. Stir until smooth. Pour mixture into greased 8x8 inch pan. Spread evenly. Sprinkle with mashed bananas then sprinkle with crushed graham crackers. Bake at 350 degrees F for 25 minutes. Let cool completely before serving.

Recipe name: Oxtail Bourguignon

Ingredients:
- Fatty Bacon
- Olive Oil
- Parsley Sprigs
- Fresh Thyme Sprigs
- Fresh Bay Leaves
- All-Purpose Flour
- Butter
- Ground Nutmeg
- Onions
- Carrots
- Garlic Cloves
- Beef Broth
- Red Burgundy Wine
- Cremini Mushrooms
- Shallots

Allergens: Milk, Eggs, Fish

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.
2. In a large pot over medium heat, cook chopped fatty bacon until crispy. Remove bacon and reserve drippings.
3. Sear the oxtails in reserved bacon grease until nicely browned on all sides. Set aside.
4. Reduce heat to low and sauté finely diced onions, carrots, and mushrooms

Recipe name: Chicken Parmesan Stuffed Peppers
Servings: 8
Prep time: 20 minutes
Cook Time: 30 Minutes
Total time: 50 minutes

Ingredients:
1 large head of bell peppers, halved lengthwise
1 lb ground chicken
1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
1 small onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 can diced tomatoes
Salt & Pepper
Olive oil

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
2. Cut tops off of bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes.
3. In a skillet over medium-high heat, cook ground chicken until brown

Recipe name: Rosemary Polenta Pound Cake
Ingredients: Buttermilk, polenta, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, fresh rosemary leaves, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs
Allergens: Milk, Eggs
Instructions:
Preheat oven at 350F / 180C. Grease & flour one loaf pan. Mix dry ingredients together then add wet ones gradually while stirring until just combined. Fold in chopped rosemary. Pour mixture evenly into prepared pan. Bake for ~90 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean when inserted near middle. Let cool completely
